title: Only one AAP MLA is accused of rape, not 40 out of 62 AAP MLAs
subtitle: Only one AAP MLA is accused of rape. There are a total of 13 MLAs who have declared cases related to crimes against women.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared widely on social media with a claim that 40 out of 62 AAP MLAs in Delhi have cases related to crime against women. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post.

Claim: 40 out of 62 AAP MLAs in Delhi are accused of rape and other crimes against women. Fact: In the ADR Report, it can be read that only one AAP MLA is accused of rape. There are a total of 13 MLAs (including the one with the rape case) who have declared cases related to crimes against women. Of those 13 MLAs, two MLAs belong to BJP. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

The ‘Association for Democratic Reforms’ (ADR) has recently released a report – ‘Delhi Assembly Election 2020 – Analysis of Criminal Background, Financial, Education, Gender and other details of MLAs’. In the report, it can be read that ‘13 MLAs have declared cases related to crimes against women. Out of these 13 MLAs, 1 MLA has declared cases related to rape (IPC Section-376)’. The same thing was also posted on ADR’s ‘Myneta.info’ Facebook page.

The details regarding those 13 MLAs and their crimes can be seen in the table below. It can be observed that there are two MLAs, who belong to BJP, among those 13 MLAs. So, it not true that 40 out of 62 AAP MLAs in Delhi are accused of rape and other crimes against women.

To sum it up, only one AAP MLA is accused of rape, not 40 out of 62 AAP MLAs.
